scripts.install: export $(grep -o "^[^#]*" .env | xargs) && cd wp-content/themes/$THEME_FOLDER_NAME && npm install
scripts.build: export $(grep -o "^[^#]*" .env | xargs) && cd wp-content/themes/$THEME_FOLDER_NAME && npm run build
scripts.dev: export $(grep -o "^[^#]*" .env | xargs) && cd wp-content/themes/$THEME_FOLDER_NAME && npm run dev
scripts.deploy-staging: export $(grep -o "^[^#]*" .env | xargs) && npm run build && rsync --delete -av -e "ssh -o ConnectTimeout=10" ./build/$THEME_FOLDER_NAME $DEPLOY_STAGING_USER@$DEPLOY_STAGING_HOSTNAME:$DEPLOY_STAGING_PATH/themes/
